attributes.action: Work with his Counterpart in Ireland (an Taoiseach) to enable transmission of RTE television via Freeview to homes in UK where over 6% of the population have Irish backgrounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: RTE Television is currently unavailable in the UK due to RTE not transmitting this as Free to air or free to view.  This is a great shame and prevents Irish people from gaining access to Irish media as per many other emigrant communities
